segments.text: Have you heard about Jessica's party on Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've heard about it , but I'm still waiting for my invitation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I got mine from her this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm guessing that she's going to give me my invite today or tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're probably right , do you intend on going to the party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to . I heard it's going to be really fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , it does sound pretty awesome .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , when does the party start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's supposed to start at about eight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many invitations has she given out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really don't know , but I don't think she gave out that many yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really want to go , so I hope that she gives me my invite soon .
segments.speaker: S2
